conclusion: Analyze the image and understand the flow of liquid through the baffles.
The image shows different colored lines labeled A, B, C, D, E, and F, which represent the paths of liquid flow.
The arrows indicate the direction of flow.
The arrows labeled A, B, and C indicate the paths of liquid flow through the baffles.
The arrows labeled A, B, and C point towards different directions, suggesting that the liquid will flow from these points.
Since the liquid flows from A, B, and C, it will flow into the container that is directly opposite these points.
The liquid will flow into container F.
